name: Frog Golf
description:
Motion sickness warning

One of the game's main mechanics involves a lot of large disorienting camera movements so feel free to avoid this game if that is an issue!

Do you enjoy frogs? Do you enjoy golf? Then I have a great game for you! Become a frog and golf with yourself!!

Controls:
wasd/arrow keys: move camera
click: prepare your golf shot
move mouse: aim your golf shot
release click: swing!
r: reset level
space: for some menus
esc: quit game
